head: Divorce Notice.
ab: Amanda J. Leake, vs. Chas. A. Leake.
U.S. District Court, Second Judicial District.
p: YOU are hereby notified that Amanda J. Leake has filed a complaint against you in the Distrct Court of the U.S. 2d Judicial District, in and for the Territory of Washington, holding terms at Olimpia, which will come on to be heard at the first term of said Court, which shall commence more than four weeks after the first publication of this notice, and unless you appear and answer, the Plaintiff will apply to the Court for the relief therein prayed for.
The object and prayer of said complaint is to obtain a divorce, on the grounds of abandonment and neglect on your part, to support the Plaintiff, for more than one year.
Complaint filed March 10th, 1865. Date of publication March 11th, 1865.
